about_the_game:
This is a visual novel about the sweet memories and slightly regrettable love between Yu Huan Yin and Gui Yan.
It is described with delicate writing, embellished with moving songs and embellished with beautiful images.
Although there are no options, it tells a story that touches the heart.

Story
I think I have forgotten just how long I have spent with you.
When I look at the moon, it is you who scents the hair in the moon halo.
When I look at the sunset, it is you who holds me from behind in the sunset.
When winter comes, you are the warmest thing around me.
When summer comes, you are the one with the taste of iced coffee in your kiss.
The dos, the don'ts, the don'ts, the don'ts, the silly ones, the smart ones, the ones only the two of us can do, we've been through a million things together.
But the only thing we've never done is say goodbye properly.

About the Dream Builders

"Modern man no longer dreams, and my job as a dream builder is to make it possible for modern man to relive the feeling of having a dream once again - even though that dream is not his own."

About Bailiwick and Creamy Ginger Covered Rice

"It's actually a dull place, even the best food is, well, just creamy ginger over rice from a local chain brand storefront. But despite that, it's true that the place where I have the most memories with her is also my favourite place."

On lifespan theory, returning swallows, and saying goodbye to her

"The hard part is never how to say it, but how to get her to accept it."
"But she'll accept it in the end, even if it will come across like I'm bullying her, she'll still accept it."
"Just like I accepted that I would only live less than six months."

Feature
A slightly bitter confession
Warm and mellow memories
Evocative dreams
And a final, well-spoken goodbye.

What to see in the game

More than thirty beautiful illustrations
Expression-rich character drawings
Full character dubbing support
CG Appreciation Mode available
Rich performance

Introduction to the main characters






QQ 953202123

content_descriptors.notes:
-Consensual kissing act
-Mild sexual innuendo
-All characters have reached adulthood

name: See You Later

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 / DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: There are so many things I want to do with the rest of my life. Like dreaming with you, laze around with you, look at the moon, eat rice with you, go on the biggest wedding trip to Antarctica, and most importantly - say goodbye to you.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
